lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ died for a sinner like me and he loves all of us so much that in his perfection he is willing to forgive our sins if we belief Christ died for our sins and is God.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: "It always seems impossible until it's done." Nelson Mandela

lender.name: Glenn & Colie
lender.loan_because: This is something Colie my 8 year old daughter and I do together because we want to bless and inspire others out of our blessings.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: as author Daniel Santiago wrote: "when hope flares, it allows human beings to overcome monstrous difficulties. It allows people to defy common sense and confound strategists."
lender.occupational_info: I lead the willing, hold the hand of the dying, preach the Gospel, and love life that is a gift from God through Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: People need opportunity.

lender.name: Elsa
lender.loan_because: I know the impact that only 25 dollars can make on lifes that often make less than $1 a day !... But more importantly, I wish to share more then money, I wish to share something much more valuable and that is INFORMATION - especially to those dealing with our very life´s sustainance: AGRICULTURE
lender.occupational_info:
Millions of farmers are bamboozled by the new "fools gold" by the big Agribusiness, such as the new genetically engineered crops, that promise miracle yields and easy times for the farmers that are tricked into trusting the big agribusiness that actually only care about their own immediate profit. I have been wanting to join KIVA for a long time and now that I have, I can`t help but worry about how the agricultural initiatives that some of the local developmental agencies support when it comes to byuing seed, for not knowing wht they´re getting into...and the temptations that farmers may be exposed to by the alluring marketing mechanisms like the ones that have been deployed in India to convince farmers to no longer grow organic, or save their own seed, and give it all up for BT crops instead - since they´re erroneously promised to be the holy grail of seeds. Publicity and marketing strategies promoted by corporations such as Monsanto, Syngenta, Pioneer, etc, have convinced many people around the world to take up their advice and products, and countries like India have seen a suicide rate in the many thousands a year, directly related to the Genetically Modified Crops and the vicious cycle of debt they introduce in every country they manage to lie their way into! http://www.celsias.com/article/how-gm-seeds-killed-more-indians-world-war-ii/ http://www.nowpublic.com/environment/farmer-suicide-belt-india. So, while I am very excited about the idea of contributing to a better world and do believe we can change it faster than ever possible before through instruments like the micro-credits and peer-to-peer initiatives via the Internet, I am deeply concerned about how those funds are going to be invested. Whether they will go toward sustainable systems of self-sufficiency and self-empowerment, through the strengthening of systems that have worked for thousands of years, including organic farming and seed saving traditions, or whether the funds will go towards further indebtedness of the families who are requesting these funds through the purchase of GM seeds. I beg of you that you please, please, please read and distribute information such as the one found in the link mentioned above as well as the ones that follow, so that we will not see another Green Revolution in Africa, like the one we have been seeing in India and the devastating consequences that come with it. Thank you so much for bearing with me as I dragged you across a really long but very important message... In the meantime, I wish all the success in the world with your projects and I leave you much love from Portugal, Elsa http://globalcitizenjourney.org/green-team/agra-watch/agra-watch-resources/
http://www.seedsofdeception.com/Public/TakeAction/index.cfm
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=3833110324043445440&ei=yIGBStmlNJDJ-AbU05nCBg&q=vandana+shiva&emb=1
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=6262083407501596844&ei=64GBSqHvG8_J-Abq9KSHAw&q=orld+accordingto+monsanto&emb=1

lender.name: Wholely Leaping Sharks!
lender.loan_because: Thanks to our excellent friends who donated to this portfolio! In 2011 we continue our idiosyncratic loan bias to bicycles, chickens, cows, bees, women, group loans, and the rural Philippines. In 2011 we are increasingly concerned about the over-availability of micro-finance in some communities and are sensitive to evidence of loan rollovers.
lender.occupational_info: We work in new technologies, which are so specialized and obscure we struggle to even explain them to our families.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: God is good

lender.name: Andreina
lender.loan_because: I believe in changing the world one step at a time.

lender.name: Mac
lender.loan_because: I believe many of our world's problems can be solved , or at least improved, through the opportunity to be a part of a small business. I believe that such endeavors create hope for the future of those involved in their local community.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and am compelled to assist others in getting a chance to make it.
lender.occupational_info: my company cleans up contaminated sites to make our Earth a cleaner place.

lender.name: Shailaja & Ashutosh
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I am deeply passionate about human rights issues, and I am especially concerned for persons and people groups who are so often forgotten by societies that place economic advantage and individual prosperity on a higher pedestal than protecting the human. lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying to become an American lawyer, and I hope to work with low-income populations in the fields of worker protection, family rights, criminal defense, and immigration law.

lender.name: Lidya and Mackenzie

lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the individual to make a change

lender.name: Kathie
lender.loan_because: It's a way I can help a small bit at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher for primary children for 30 years. Now I am helping at the Red Cross and taking care of some dogs who are waiting to find homes.

lender.name: Vivek
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed in my life and it is now time to give back a little to empower those less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: john
lender.occupational_info: Working on licitatii online

lender.name: MarktoMarket
lender.occupational_info: Mark-to-MarketDebate.com is devoted to educating the American public on the mark-to-market accounting issue that is affecting financial institutions nationwide.

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to give people a hand up instead of a hand out.

lender.name: donald
lender.loan_because: for whom much is given ,much is required

lender.name: Nate&Josie
lender.loan_because: of that warm fuzzy feeling. You know the one.
lender.occupational_info: Josie loves being a student and hopes to stay a student as long as possible. Nathaniel works in a cube staring at squiggly lines that represent the inside of the Earth.

lender.name: Nick&Lauren
lender.occupational_info: Nick fixes old buildings and Lauren edits college history books.

lender.name: Fracture
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I want to support my fellows...!
lender.occupational_info: I print your favorite digital photos directly onto glass, and make it into a once piece picture frame on your wall.

lender.name: finasteride
lender.occupational_info: The following is a registered trademark of Merck & Co. Inc. (NYSE:MRK) for more information please visit http://www.merck.com

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of the change.
lender.occupational_info: I am a woman who cares for 2 wonderful children. I also tend to household chores. Plus I school my children at home.

lender.name: Jane M
lender.loan_because: I am human and I can.
lender.occupational_info: I create the blueprints for websites.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I have a responsibility to share that with others.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: it is the highest level of charity.
lender.occupational_info: Helping the world's poorest villages transform themselves.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at success.
lender.occupational_info: I develop information solutions for companies to gain better insight to profitability by uniting sales, expenses and other resources. I create 3-dimensional models from data that can be examined through Microsoft Office tools.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: It's time to start helping others in a directed, intentional way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an interactive designer for Free Range Studios. My work supports arts education, environmental awareness and universal access to life sustaining necessities such as fresh water, organic foods and health care.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege to help someone to help themselves. I have been helped many times in my life. I want to do the same for someone else. I think these entrepeneurs are amazing people! I only wish them every success!

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: My sister is a Kiva Fellow!!!
lender.occupational_info: I make people dance and laugh.

lender.name: Milo
lender.loan_because: I can and it's pleasing to my Lord Jesus.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to find real, meaningful loving relationship with God.

lender.name: Emmie
lender.loan_because: I know from my own experience as an entrepreneur that a little bit of help can go a long way.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: it make me happy! :)
lender.occupational_info: I develop new technologies for documents and images processing.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: It's important to be kind and help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I draw Celtic designs that reflect my Irish heritage and continue our cultural traditions. I sell my art online through "print on demand" companies who print it on clothes and gifts for me.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: small steps taken by many help build bridges
lender.occupational_info: helping businesses operate better

lender.name: Jon & Laura
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to use their God-given gifts to provide for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: Jon is a graduate student developing medical techniques to help children with brain injuries. Laura is a pediatric nurse.

lender.name: Neece
lender.loan_because: I have a very giving son, Sjon, whom gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my birthday. I think it is the generous gift I have ever recieved.

lender.name: Teressa
lender.loan_because: I wanted to be a better giver.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to. Pay it forward.

lender.name: Fredrik Wallmark
lender.loan_because: I feel I can help less fortunate to build a better and more prosperous world. Thanks Gwen and Martin for introducing me to kiva.org!
lender.occupational_info: As a consultant I help business leaders improve their companies to be more profitable

lender.name: Dieter
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: it is our responsibility to support others who are entrepreneurs with less capital, resources, or training than we have recieved. Share knowledge, skills, and resources.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self-sufficiency expert. I endeavour to make others aware of their natural talents, resources, and abilities, and to embetter the world around them by encouraging others to do the same.

lender.name: Prakash
lender.occupation: An experienced Banker from Mumbai, India.

lender.name: Shawne
lender.loan_because: I want to help out people in the best way possible. I don't necessarily trust the charities in how they dole out money but want to help people willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a call center environment. Managing a team of technicians that assist the customers with their server and PC issues.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I know that just a little can change someone's life a lot. Entrepreneurship can change the lives of so many people, especially those of women, and by giving them power and autonomy, we can change the world.

lender.name: Nannyonga
lender.loan_because: We want to purchase a straw pressing machine. Currently, we are using a local knife to press the straws. This method is slow and ineffective.
lender.occupational_info: Our project recycles used plastic straw into a useful unique product. We get products like shopping bags, table mats, door mats, mats, earrings, belts, handbags etc. Thus we turn a burden into an opportunity.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: honest hard working people deserve a chance to improve their lives and the best way to achieve that is by allowing them access to capital. As a firm believer in the free enterprise, this is my way of doing my part.

lender.name: machine
lender.loan_because: slots machines, slots, free slots, casino
lender.occupational_info: Come play now!Try the best places to gamble only at casino slot machine!

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.occupation: I am a stay at home mom.
lender.loan_because: I am a christian and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I do not work. I stay home and care for my family

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I don't need the money right now, and someone else does.
lender.occupational_info: I study experimentally how the brain works.
